content:
bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail
branch="feature/gui-egui-mvp"
# Detect git root
root=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)
echo "Git root: $root"

# Stash local changes if any
if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain -uno)" ]; then
  echo "Local changes detected; creating a stash before switching..."
  git stash push -u -m "codex auto-stash before switching to ${branch}" || true
else
  echo "No local changes to stash."
fi

# Ensure we have the branch refs
echo "Fetching remotes..."
git fetch --all --prune --tags || true

# Switch to branch
if git rev-parse --verify --quiet "${branch}" >/dev/null; then
  echo "Switching to existing local branch ${branch}"
  git switch "${branch}" || git checkout "${branch}"
elif git rev-parse --verify --quiet "origin/${branch}" >/dev/null; then
  echo "Creating local tracking branch ${branch} from origin/${branch}"
  git switch -c "${branch}" "origin/${branch}" || git checkout -b "${branch}" "origin/${branch}"
else
  echo "Branch ${branch} not found locally or on origin. Aborting." >&2
  exit 2
fi

echo "Now on: $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)"
 git --no-pager log --oneline -n 3 --decorate'

bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail
# 1) Show env file
cat /home/viper/.cargo/env || true
# 2) Check cargo binary directly
ls -l /home/viper/.cargo/bin/cargo || true
/home/viper/.cargo/bin/cargo --version || true
# 3) Prepend to PATH and recheck
export PATH="/home/viper/.cargo/bin:$PATH"
which cargo || true
cargo --version || true
# 4) Persist to shell config
{ echo '"'export PATH=\""'$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"'"'; } >> /home/viper/.bashrc
{ echo 'if [ -f \""'$HOME/.bashrc" ]; then . "$HOME/.bashrc"; fi'"'; } >> /home/viper/.bash_profile
# Source for current shell
. /home/viper/.bashrc || true
# 5) Build/run tasks
cd /home/viper/codex/codex-rs
# Discover a GUI crate name if present; else fall back to CLI
rg -n \"\\[package\\]\" -n **/Cargo.toml | rg -n \"codex-gui|egui|eframe|mvp\" -n || true
# Try fmt
cargo fmt -- --config imports_granularity=Item || true
# Prefer codex-cli if no GUI crate
if rg -n \""'^name'"\\s*=\\s*\\\"codex-gui\\\"\" **/Cargo.toml >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  crate=codex-gui
else
  crate=codex-cli
fi
cargo clippy -p \""'$crate" --fix --all-features --tests --allow-dirty || true
# Run the chosen crate (GUI might be a bin or example; try run -p, else run bin codex)
if [ "$crate" = "codex-gui" ]; then
  cargo run -p codex-gui || true
else
  cargo run --bin codex -- --memory on --full-auto || true
fi
'
